actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an optional credit for taxes or rent paid on a principal residence by persons who are 65 years of age of older, and by persons who are handicapped.

summary.text: Permits, under the Internal Revenue Code, a taxpayer who has attained the age of 65 or one who is disabled to take an optional tax credit of up to $250 against the income tax for real property taxes paid, or for the amount of rent constituting such taxes paid by the taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an optional credit for taxes or rent paid on a principal residence by persons who are 65 years of age of older, and by persons who are handicapped.
